scripts.monitor-test: webpack ; NODE_ENV=production PORT=3002 node server.js & PID=$! ; sleep 1 ; MONITOR_BASE_URL='http://localhost:3002' MONITOR_CLIENT_ID='01234567891' MONITOR_FAMILY_NAME='Familyname' casperjs test/monitor/*.js ; RESULT=$? ; kill $PID ; exit $RESULT
scripts.a11y: webpack ; NODE_ENV=production PORT=3003 node server.js & PID=$! ; sleep 1 ; pa11y -e node_modules/.bin/phantomjs http://localhost:3003/login && pa11y -e node_modules/.bin/phantomjs http://localhost:3003/calendar && pa11y -e node_modules/.bin/phantomjs http://localhost:3003/confirmation && pa11y -e node_modules/.bin/phantomjs http://localhost:3003/error && pa11y -e node_modules/.bin/phantomjs http://localhost:3003/session_timeout ; RESULT=$? ; kill $PID ; exit $RESULT
scripts.uitest: webpack ; NODE_ENV=production PORT=3001 node server.js & PID=$! ; sleep 1 ; PORT=3001 tape test/ui/*.js ; RESULT=$? ; kill $PID ; exit $RESULT
